    • Method Detail

      • quoteURIPath

        public static String quoteURIPath(String unquotedPath)
        Quotes special characters in path fragment of a URL. This is different from URL encoding, of for example form submission results. This will replace characters in the URI, such as space (' ') with '+' rather than "%2F" as you would get from URL encoding.
        Parameters:
        unquotedPath - the unquoted path
        Returns:
        quoted path

      • isURL

        public static boolean isURL(String theURL)
        Return whether or not the string is a valid URL
        Parameters:
        theURL - the string to test
        Returns:
        true if the string is a valid URL, false otherwise

      • isURI

        public static boolean isURI(String theURI)
        Return whether or not the string is a valid URI
        Parameters:
        theURI - the string to test
        Returns:
        true if it is a valid URI, false otherwise

      • lookupIP

        public static InetAddress lookupIP(String theDN)
                            throws UnknownHostException
        Lookup the IP for a domain name
        Parameters:
        theDN - the domain name
        Returns:
        the IP
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if a machine with the specified domain name does not exist

      • reverseLookup

        public static String reverseLookup(String theIP)
                            throws UnknownHostException
        Attempt a reverse look-up with an IP to get a domain name
        Parameters:
        theIP - the IP to lookup
        Returns:
        the domain name corresponding to the IP
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if a machine with the specified IP does not exist, or a domain name cannot be found

      • mask

        public static byte[] mask(String theNetIP)
        Return the masked IP of the given network IP
        Parameters:
        theNetIP - the network IP
        Returns:
        the masked IP

      • isIP

        public static boolean isIP(String theString)
        Return whether or not the string represents a possible value IP. This will return true if the IP is syntactically valid, it does not determine whether or not it's the IP of anything actually addressable.
        Parameters:
        theString - the possible IP
        Returns:
        true if its a syntactically valid IP, false otherwise.

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(String theNetIP,
                               String theIP)
                        throws UnknownHostException
        Return true if the provided IP is on the given network using some IP math
        Parameters:
        theNetIP - the Network's IP
        theIP - the IP to check
        Returns:
        true of theIP is on the specified network
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - thrown if there is an issue getting the IP

      • getIpClass

        public static NetUtils.IPClass getIpClass(InetAddress theAddress)
        Given an IP, return the IP class it fits into
        Parameters:
        theAddress - the IP
        Returns:
        the IP class for the given IP

      • getSubnetMask

        public static byte[] getSubnetMask(InetAddress theAddress)
        Return the subnet mask for the IP
        Parameters:
        theAddress - the IP
        Returns:
        the subnet mask as an array of 4 bytes for each part of the mask
